TopicTitle: Delta-V updating to zero after docking craft

Articles.Content: the delta-V for the craft will be set to zero when you dock it with another craft in the example shown the crafts have a combined hydrogen mass of 150 tons and I can burn with the engine  but the delta-V calculation is showing 0. https://imgur.com/8IPXxpv  Here you can see the  same main body with a liquid stage docked to it and it is showing a delta-V of zero. https://imgur.com/nMybQyz
I'm not sure if it is related, but my Delta-V also suddenly became zero on both a craft I launched into space (simple lander with no docking ports) and even in my VAB since then.
